properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.connectTimeout
properties.description: 可选: 创建连接超时时间，单位second, 默认5s

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.downloadHost
properties.description: 必填: 文件资源下载域名，如fastdfs.yijifu.net

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.encryptedDownloadHost
properties.description: 可选: 加密文件资源下载域名，如ppm.yijifu.net

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.encryptedGroups
properties.description: 可选: 所以对文件进行加密的组，多个组以逗号分隔

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.healthCheckGroup
properties.description: 可选: 设置了healthCheckGroup的话，组件健康检查时，只检查指定group存储服务

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.networkTimeOut
properties.description: 可选: 数据连接超时时间，单位second，默认30s

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.pool.maxIdlePerNode
properties.description: 可选：单个服务结点最大空闲连接数，默认为1

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.pool.maxTotal
properties.description: 可选: 最大连接数, 默认为200

properties.name: yiji.fastdfs.pool.maxTotalPerNode
properties.description: 可选：单个服务结点最大连接数，默认为3
